name: Uncrime: detective games
description:
Uncrime is an addictive detective game! Are you ready to prove your discerning skills?

Mysterious misdeeds and cunning lawbreakers are waiting for you. Use your mind and logic to crack the case.

You find yourself in an abandoned city where you can conduct your own investigation: look for evidence, examine witnesses, and expose the criminal - act like a real detective!
Help residents, solve crimes and save the city!

FEATURES

- A huge collection of thrilling stories will truly blow your mind! Drama, betrayal, murder, abduction - can you bring a liar to light?
- Cool comic style gameplay and addictive detective stories! Improve your skills - reveal more exciting stories!
- Complete tasks and get bonuses that will help you in your detective work. Stuck in the game? Use hints and play on!

Fans of crime and comic books will love our detective game. With cool gameplay and lots of different stories to explore for each case, you’ll be solving crimes like Sherlock Holmes or Poirot!

Uncrime will keep you on your toes!
